content.maql: SELECT CASE WHEN {label/dt_timeline_timestamp.year} = "2018" THEN -123400, WHEN {label/dt_timeline_timestamp.year} = "2019" THEN 36200, WHEN {label/dt_timeline_timestamp.year} = "2020" THEN 54800, WHEN {label/dt_timeline_timestamp.year} = "2021" THEN 48100 END
SELECT MAX({fact/fact.f_timeline.timelinedate}) BY ALL IN ALL OTHER DIMENSIONS EXCEPT {attribute/dt_timeline_timestamp.day}

SELECT MAX({fact/fact.f_opportunitysnapshot.oppsnapshotdate}) BY ALL IN ALL OTHER DIMENSIONS EXCEPT {attribute/dt_snapshotdate_timestamp.day} WHERE {fact/fact.f_opportunitysnapshot.oppsnapshotdate} <= {metric/6b1411d5-e253-418e-8fd3-137a9f56ea92}
select min({fact/fact.f_opportunitysnapshot.oppsnapshotdate}) by all in all other dimensions except {attribute/f_opportunity.id}

SELECT MIN({fact/fact.f_opportunitysnapshot.oppsnapshotdate}) BY ALL IN ALL OTHER DIMENSIONS EXCEPT {attribute/dt_snapshotdate_timestamp.day} WHERE {fact/fact.f_opportunitysnapshot.oppsnapshotdate} >= {metric/timeline_bop}
SELECT MIN({fact/fact.f_timeline.timelinedate}) BY ALL IN ALL OTHER DIMENSIONS EXCEPT {attribute/dt_timeline_timestamp.day}
